column3:
A very small number of people care about a precompiled bitcoind on the Mac; I don't think it is worth the extra build time or hassle of fetching/building dependencies.

So I think this should wait until there's a gitian-built OSX Bitcoin-Qt release working.  Nice work, though, I'm impressed you got osx bitcoind cross-compiling....
This no longer works with master (GCC 4.0 can't handle boost signals it seems), so closing for now.\n
